name: BPO VA - Out of Business
description: At BPO Virtual Assistant, we provide highly skilled and affordable staff, who have previous experience and university degrees. We can provide a range of assistant services including Virtual Assistant, Accounting and Finance, Draftsman, I.T services and HR, just to name a few. If the job can be done remotely, our team of experts can find you the right person for a fraction of the cost of someone locally.
